alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County; Sheep Range; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 01 at 9:02AM PDT until August 01 at 9:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central Nevada and southern Nevada, including the following areas, in south central Nevada, Esmeralda and Central Nye County and Lincoln County. In southern Nevada, Sheep Range and Western Clark and Southern Nye County. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County; Sheep Range; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
